doc.field: Mark Hall Amitin/ World of Culture for the Performing Arts, Inc. Archive
Mark Hall Amitin/ World of Culture for the Performing Arts, Inc. Archive

In addition to posters there are some oversize photographs (The Living Theatre) as well as sketches and technical drawings in this series. There is also a large scrapbook in folder 1 of box 78. Materials are arranged alphabetically according to theatre group or director. A performance title is given only when no theatre group or director is indicated. The two boxes (one small, one large) are alphabetized independently.
Mark Hall Amitin/ World of Culture for the Performing Arts, Inc. Archive
